website_summaries.verdict: It's efficient and cooks fast if you don't mind cooking with propane, but it also comes with some issues that can affect its performance.
pros: An acceptable choice for outdoor turkey frying, thanks to its spacious 29 qt
Includes 2 pots, rack, and lifting hook
cons: The timer and thermometer have been known to malfunction

customer_reviews.title: Shipped very very fast!!! Awesome fryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Used it as soon as it arrived. I use these all the time. Really like all the options and base is strong. Didn't want timer so I did not install a battery and placed a zip strip over button on timer.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Fry, boil, steam all-in-one
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners. I've fried a whole turkey, chicken, and did a shrimp boil in this and everything turned out perfect. Just remember there is a safety timer on the gas line that shuts off after about 10-15 mins, so you need to keep checking on it and resetting the safety valve. Some people have complained about this, but I didn't find it that big of a deal. I like to check on my food frequently anyway, and it's better than burning your yard or house down.
customer_reviews.author: 8675 3oh9999

customer_reviews.title: Stay away. Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have gotten in three weeks. First one was dented up but wasn't to bad, and started leaking upon first use. Caught fire and ruined the Thanksgiving turkey. Asked for a refund, instead an hour later received an email stating replacement would be shipped soon. Replacement arrives in worse condition than the first one. Leaks just filling with water. Cheaply made. Save yourself the money and headache and buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: TJ & Family

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a starter kit that needs to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a starter kit that needs to be modified. The burner has a timer on it...super annoying. I went to the hardware store and bought a replacement hose attachment and now it is good to go. The pot it came with was kind of dinged up during shipping and is really too small to do much with. Bought a much larger pot and had a successful (and delicious) shrimp boil. After the modifications/additions, I still spent less than the more expensive kits, so this is still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great pot, cooks well, annoying safety feature.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a low country boil, works great. While I understand the timer/auto shut-off feature it is super annoying. If you are trying to maintain a boil just don't walk away. Aggravating to come back and the fuel supply is shut off. The smaller pot is a really nice addition and I look forward to using that for smaller fish frys, etc. All in all a very good pot.
customer_reviews.author: R J.

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying to have to countinously hit the timer every 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very annoying to have to countinously hit the timer every 30 minutes to avoid the burner turning off. After 5-6 uses, my burner no longer stays lit, and now I need to replace. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good value overall
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best overall outdoor cooker sets available on Amazon. There are somethings that would make it better however. The basket insert could be bigger. The safety timer is a pain, but I had an older burner that I used and will keep this one for a spare. The pot is lightweight which is both good and bad. Used it to cook clams, oyster, crabs and corn on the cob. Handled it all and worked great. Overall am pleased that I bought it and would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mel R.

customer_reviews.title: The "King" of kits online.
customer_reviews.text: I received this cooking kit as advertised. Assembly was quick and easy. Flame is adjustable with the adjustable regulator. I'll be frying turkeys for Thanksgiving. I'm also using the deep frying pot to fry lots of foods outside. Pots are heavy duty and one lid is included.
customer_reviews.author: toolfxr

customer_reviews.title: Timer can be easily disabled. YouTube “king kooker” to find out how
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the quality fits the price. The reason for 4 stars as I wish King Kooker had the option to buy nicer stock pots and fryer and basket with the same burner setup. The stock pots, fryer, and basket are of very thin metal and i doubt will last. The thermometer and turkey attachments are good enough. (Picture does not include basket and turkey attachments). People are giving 1,2,3 stars because of the 15 minute timer function auto shutoff. Earth to those people, there’s something called YouTube. Search “king kooker”, literally the first video that pops up is how to disable this feature, and with basic tools it takes 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Polley

customer_reviews.title: It has many cooking uses beside just frying a Turkey.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quality and what you get that's included in the package. I Just used it as a fundraiser raffle and at $2 each/3 for $5 chances to win, we sold 3 times as much tickets as what was the cost. Many were impressed by the many cooking uses ( frying fish and shrimp, making low country boil, fish stew for an army of friends and family) and it was a very desirable product.
customer_reviews.author: flagreyhound

customer_reviews.title: I saw a review or the pot had Melted now I know it was true
customer_reviews.text: I was using the product for deep frying turkeys and chickens. I used it three days in a row The last day I clean the oil out of it and got ready to clean it up the bottom of the pot was bent and distorted from the heat not at all saved in my view I threw the pot away I was scared it was dangerous
customer_reviews.author: thomas darnell

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews...
customer_reviews.text: Dented in multiple places like others have posted. We ordered as an Amazon Warehouse returned item, and a bit surprised Amazon re-packaged and sold it like we received. Fortunately, ours was minor enough and the metal is thin enough that I straightened the worst parts out and the lid (almost) fits. I’ll give the burner a try tomorrow. Assuming it works, the whole thing is about worth it for the burner and a mostly usabale set of fryer pots.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have now fried two turkeys with this and it has worked as advertised. The pot is thin so I could definitely understand it being delivered with damage to the point it leaks, I rolled the dice and mine was fine. The other issue I noticed complaints about was the safety device - you have to press the button every 15 minutes to maintain gas flow. I'm not sure why this is a problem, you're crazy if you aren't already checking on your giant boiling pot of oil/water every 15 minutes. I'd rather be inconvenienced that put my family or home in danger. Overall I'm satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Ray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese garbage
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it is possible to make this stuff any cheaper and thinner. I bought the same set 15 years ago and its like 10 times thicker and better made pots. returned it to look elsewhere. Thanks King Kooker for making such a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We fried two 13 pound turkeys for Thanksgiving with this year. Easy to put together, fires up quickly to 350 degrees and look forward to other uses for this as the spring and summer approach. The included pots didn't seem to be an issue at all. Don't forget the safety mitts if working with the turkey!
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate strainer basket for full pot boils
customer_reviews.text: This item is very disappointing. All is great with the material and construction. Issue is that the strainer basket is half the height of the pot. For a turkey fryer it would work great but for Cajun boils it isn’t adequate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Seams strong
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use this unit yet I will update later it seems strong comes with everything you need the only concern I have is there is no guard to hold the pot on the burner I suspect if you run into it either way it would fall over maybe it's just a aesthetics but I would like to see some sort of guard on there.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Warner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Turkey Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Father's day gift for my dad. Tested a 5lb chicken in it this past Sunday... Delicious! Once we figured out how to set it up and turn it on safely, the rest was a cinch! I will be frying the turkey for Thanksgiving 2018 and can't wait to share with our extended family! Also, interesting note... the meat was very moist and tender after it was fried. Since turkey is a generally dry type of meat, deep frying will help bring out the moistness in the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Pax

customer_reviews.title: Great kit !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit!!! I have had several other fryers in the past. Happy with the timer. Just had a 20 lbs turkey fry with excellent results. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Turkey fryer
customer_reviews.text: Pots work good. As others stated, get a tube that won't cut off every 15 mins. That's annoying. Other than that, we have used these pots and burner several times. 2 years to fry a turkey, and we have had a crawfish boil as well. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Steam basket too small
customer_reviews.text: The cooker itself was fine. It does come with the safety feature on the gas line which is very aggravating. I have already ordered a replacement hose/ regulator to go on it. The pot is thin aluminum, not fancy or heavy duty by any means, but serves it's purpose. The steamer basket for the 30qt pot is barely a 1/3 of the size of the pot. I made it work for a low country boil and steaming oysters, but if I had to do it again, I would big a different set up.
customer_reviews.author: jason l. butler

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to be able to do boiled potatoes and boil corn for a huge birthday party. I will have to say I was a little hesitant after seeing some of the previous reviews of damage upon arrival. I would love to confirm the fact that it arrived in perfect shape and went together easily. I look forward to using it tomorrow and making six dozen cobs of corn and 20 pounds of potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Gowan

customer_reviews.title: King Kooker
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift. My son used it at Thanksgiving and it worked great. The safety feature was a challenge, but I like that it can't stay too hot. The different size baskets are great! Cooked corn and potatoes in crab boil, pulled them out and boiled crab legs in it ( done last as had 2 allergic to shellfish) . Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R

customer_reviews.title: Love this Turkey Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this weekend, works great. The only thing I didn't like was that the pot came damaged with dents and the basket as well. Didn't return because I figured it was going to get well used over time anyways, but would have like for this item to come better packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Used cooker
customer_reviews.text: Super thin metal, safety timer on adjustment valve, came dirty and used as seen in pictures. I would recommend paying more and getting a better quality and actual new product.
customer_reviews.author: David Laws

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for boiling down maple sap into syrup. Although the set is quite cheaply made, the price was right and I suppose you get what you pay for. It takes about 4 hours to boil down 7 gallons. Finally figured out you can tape the timer down and let it cook. Maybe not the best idea with oil so use caution there. Works wonderfully and the smaller pan is great for finishing off your syrup
customer_reviews.author: James Parker

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make it easy to make a hobo dinner. When I got it, the pot had a dent into the rim, the lid did not fit any of the pots. Unfortunately, I did not have enough time to call and complain and had to work with it for the party. The burner had a 15 minutes timer. So every 15 minutes we had to restart it, which made cook time longer. Very disappointed, and will not buy brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J Curson

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment broke first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: The auto shut off mode is terrible. You will probably have to start it three times to get water to boil. It has a cheap plastic battery compartment for the shut off valve and is easily broken. Had to gorilla tape the battery compartment closed after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We loved using the cooker
customer_reviews.text: We loved using the cooker. The only reason four stars: directions weren't complete so a few parts had to be guessed by small picture on box. Also the regulator on the tank cuts off every 15 mins slowing the cook time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What we expected.
customer_reviews.text: We've cooked shrimp boil and a turkey so far in this. Easy to use. Have not fried fish yet. When we do we won't use the smaller pot because it's too thin, grease will burn it I'm sure. Great for beginners. Eventually we will upgrade to a solid two burner.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Goodfellow

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price cheap product
customer_reviews.text: It's a very cheap pot. The inside is hard to clean from the groves. I guess it works fine for now since we were in a pinch. Just wish the pot wasn't dented. The lid wont shut.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying from a third party and a used item but the price was right so I took a chance. I am thrilled! No dents or dings, EVERYTHING was in the pre opened box. I'm very impressed. Thank you for the great deal and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Vallory Jayne Plair

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Great combo for tailgating and RV resorts, fish frys and boils are easy with this bundle, priced right. The timer is only for about 15min but it’s for your safety, never leave the unit alone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bourg

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor fryer
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is just what you need to do your outdoor cooking. I use mine for frying fish. The set gives two aluminum pots (which I like) and I use the smaller of the two for fish anything that requires shallow depth. I can't wait to try a turkey in the larger pot or even fried crabs. This purchase was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Lover

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price....cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used 1 time and it did fine. The next weekend I went to use it and couldn't get gas to flow. The regulator failed. I had guests coming over so I had to borrow a fish cooker. I then ordered a new regulator that doesn't have the timer, which was a pain in the butt any way. The pots are just ok. This is a cheap setup. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: brezzer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for 15 minutes at a time. Having the timer turn it off every 15 minutes may be a safety precaution but causes it to be relegated to the shed until I figure out a way to override the timer. It’s real hard to heat anything that would fill the pot in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: RFrit

customer_reviews.title: however the pot is totally useless. It’s bent
customer_reviews.text: I just received king kooker Deep Frying Package. Delivery was very quick, however the pot is totally useless. It’s bent, has a hole, will be returning this team.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This product almost ruined my Thanksgiving. Gas would not tighten on my kerosene tank. Had to run to Lowes to buy a new one. And I cant return it. I am now stuck with a deep fryer that is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 2 years ago off and I am just now getting around to leaving a review but I love this!!!! We use it primarily for seafood boils and it does great every single time. The pot is 7.25 gallons so it can accommodate a large party and this set comes with all the parts you need. 10/10 would highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect gift for a new homeowner
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for a new homeowner. Our friends have enjoying using it for steamers, lobster and corn on the cob so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and big but there safely regulator stinks the fryer shuts off every 15 min very agitated to use wouldn’t recommend just for this reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The stand was stable and the burner was rugged and well built. The container is light and dents easily, but I was boiling sap for maple syrup so it wasn't a huge issue. The lid however was dented during the delivery process and doesn't fit the top very well (but again - that wasn't a huge issue for my use). I have boiled sap with the product for over 30 hours and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dougall

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got to use it once and that is it it started leaking out of the bottom on the pot......sucks i must have got a bad one..
customer_reviews.author: Max Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. The pot is a little thin and had a dent when we received it but everything else was great. We've used it twice with no problems and even if we eventually have to replace the pot its still a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The system isn't user friendly and for some reason, has an automatic shutoff system after a few minutes. Once I got oil hot and when I went to put the fish in to cook it, the system had shut off already. I stopped using this product because it was too frustating
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, took me only five minutes. Very stable, tipping was not a concern. Only downside is that it come with a lot of extra pots and strainers that most people will never use. Sell the basic set and acceseries seperately.
customer_reviews.author: B Guy

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this.. but once I put the big pot on to do a low country boil.. after 10 mins the flame would go out. I have to relight it 7 times. I'm guess not enough air getting through
customer_reviews.author: MAGS

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Did allot of research and read many reviews on this item before ordering. I was very pleased plug & go the pot looked new did not have problems with dents as others mentioned. The timer does need batteries but I just used the timer on my phone
customer_reviews.author: CCato

customer_reviews.title: Not packed very well..damaged when it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Saw in reviews where a lot of them arrived dented..well, guess what? It arrived dented...but since it was still usable, we kept it anyway. Would not order another one, though.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product with nice accessories
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our annual shrimp boil. It arrived exactly on time & worked great. Not all of these packages have the drainer pan. This was my primary reason for choosing this particular product
customer_reviews.author: jholmes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! We have a friends set now and the quality is night and day. I did see Pam’s with a hole in the bottom and could complete see how this would happen with this set. We returned before using
customer_reviews.author: Stay at home mom

customer_reviews.title: The pots are aluminum and a bit thin, so ...
customer_reviews.text: The pots are aluminum and a bit thin, so I wouldn't use this for much else than frying or boiling. But that being said, that burner can really heat things up quick!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cisar

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: With a little modifications it works great. The burner is great, it boiled the water very quickly. The timer is very annoying but can be modified. The pots are very cheap and thin.
customer_reviews.author: L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its a decent Fryer, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: OK for the once a year user. Not real well made, pots are very thin. Do yourself a favor and buy a longer hose and regulator without that stupid timer. I did.
customer_reviews.author: obars

customer_reviews.title: Cooking with propane is good.
customer_reviews.text: We really like our King Kooker and our turkey was delicious. This was our first time using this method of cooking and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON GOODWIN

customer_reviews.title: These are not heavy duty so know that going into this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely is not the BEST on the market. The pots are extremely weak and actually arrived bent. But I had to have the pots and had no choice. It did it’s job but I won’t rely on the pots to hold up to much.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Butler

customer_reviews.title: Family cookout.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this even though some reviews said that the item came damaged. When I received the package I was happy to see that it was double boxed. After opening the boxes I was very pleased to see that there was no damage. Nice sturdy cooker,I would recommended buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good....
customer_reviews.text: For now, I give this product 5-stars, just for arriving intact with all the pieces in the box. I'll be taking it for a test run this week, and will then extend my review on usability and efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Valor

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought that since the older reviews complained about the item being shipped with dents, that the company surely would have adjusted their packaging by now. WRONG! I received my fryer with three different dented sides. The stand is low and not as sturdy as others. The 15 minute timer, is annoying especially when you are trying to keep consistent heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner setup
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet because its winter but this looks to be a good beginner setup. See some of the other comments about the safety shutoff though.
customer_reviews.author: Mat N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.....
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a shrimp boil. Worked right out of the box and everything worked wonderfully. Very durable, thick and well made pots. The burner was easy peasy to hook up and worked even when it got a little windy.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last minute for thanksgiving. Glad I did. I researched lots of different styles. This one won and did its job well. Great directions and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good cooker and a heckuva bargain. Cooked crab, steamed pacific oysters, and will soon try frying a turkey.
customer_reviews.author: gary miller

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal
customer_reviews.text: I'm not no city folk didn't like the battry lite thng
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and made a delicious Turkey. Love that it has a safety feature which requires you to check it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisi41

customer_reviews.title: Automatic cut off on the regulator is a headache
customer_reviews.text: Not wild about the automatic cutoff on the regulator valve. Real pain is the rear.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyMan

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for Thanksgiving. Next will be a seafood boil or perhaps a fish fry.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M, MT(AAB)

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I received this with a minor damage ding. The manufacture replaced it immediately. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: D. C Owens

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good set but you will have to immediately clean it after every use or the pot will stain and start to wear the pot thin with the salt from steaming
customer_reviews.author: david jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Turkey came out great!
customer_reviews.text: We deep fried our first turkey on Thanksgiving (but did a practice chicken the day before) and it works great! It's nice that the set comes with all the components (unlike some where you have to buy the pieces individually). If you are brave enough to attempt the turkey deep fry, this is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SusieSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Burner won't stay lit. Pans came damaged stand paint is coming apart and flaking off after 1 use. Too cheap buy a better one
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Came all dented. Regulator takes a battery which it doesn't come with and you have to press every 15 minutes or it will shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son.We have used the same one and it fried our fish perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan in LSL

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used has fryer but boiled up some seafood. It is a little light and thin and yes gets black from the propane fire but that is not uncommon
customer_reviews.author: Highrailer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Deep Frier
customer_reviews.text: Cooked 3x20lb birds in the past month. The turkeys came out perfect, can't wait for spring time to steam some seafood.
customer_reviews.author: Chef D

customer_reviews.title: Great for a seafood boil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a seafood boil. The only inconvenience is the timer which I know is a safety feature that numerous reviews mentioned so I knew before I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Lessons learned.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I was trying to save money, but I’ll be replacing this soon or sending it back. The basket for the big pot is about half the size it should be. It is lower end material, and both pots are dented. The burner does seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like the timer but other than that this is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He doesn't like the timer but other than that this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: pjordan5

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is great with the accessories
customer_reviews.text: It would get 5 stars but the battery compartment cover is made so cheap that it broke with the first time opening it! Had to use a clamp to keep it shut! Otherwise it is great with the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Hate the 15 minute timer. I get why it’s there but i Should be able to reset without it turning off the flame and making me relight
customer_reviews.author: scott mackey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Held up well for our first crawfish boil. There is some space between basket and pot so some food slipped between the two. Other then that it did great
customer_reviews.author: good information

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer! No problem with operating this. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Still get use to this product....first time user. Cooks well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked, all the pieces are durable. Haven't had any issue with any rust spots and we've had this product about 9 months now. We've used this a couple times doing crab boils and we'll be using it for many more family cookouts to come.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Schneider

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: so much better than my old walmart set. i love this set.
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 7-10 person Shrimp Boil
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a couple of reasons. Was holding a shrimp boil and wanted a large container to do so, and eventually to fry a turkey during thanksgiving. It pulled off the shrimp boil with ease, fed everyone, and had plenty of left overs. Looking forward to the turkey fry!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Uncapher

customer_reviews.title: Good product, read about automatic shutoff.
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of equipment mechanically. Included in propane hose is a battery-powered electronic device that shuts off flow after 15 minutes. It's tough to heat oil when you are entertaining and the gas keeps shutting off.
customer_reviews.author: Ted (WNY)

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Love it but the metal where the flame comes out is getting fried to pieces. We've used it a handful of times and it's already showing through.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie DeAngelis

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the 30 quart pot had some dings and dents. But i will say this thing works amazing! I fried a turkey fir the first time today, it was a huge success, everyone loved it. I wilm recommend this cooker to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what u get
customer_reviews.text: Cheap aluminum pot set you pay for what u get
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: The pot is super thin, cools down very quickly with colder weather. Burner shuts off after 15 minutes, supposedly a safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great so easy I can use it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this thing he can make chicken wings and deep fry a turkey. Works great so easy I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Fryer
customer_reviews.text: The ingitor goes out all the time. Should come equiped with a lighter as your constantly having to relight it
customer_reviews.author: brittany bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fried an 18 lb turkey!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, works perfect! We perfectly fried an 18 lb turkey with zero issues!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cant wait to use it at our next camping fish fry. exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth kramer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Items damaged by the way they are packed in box. Stand for burner sits on top of stockpot and dents the lip of the pot in. Purchased 2 of these and both were damaged so I returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The steamer basket is half the size of the pot.
customer_reviews.text: The pot is made of good quality. The steamer basket is half the size of the pot, so it wasn’t what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: christy billions

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it seemed bigger in the photo pay attention to size.. but all in all works great and cooks well
customer_reviews.author: JustSoYouKnow

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cooker! Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This King Kooker is an excellent quality deep fryer. We made over 200 wings, chips, vegetables and calamari without a problem! The fifteen minute auto turn off was no big deal. The stand, pots and strainers were very sturdy! Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Martin P Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker@
customer_reviews.text: We bought this deep fryer/boiler before going on our family's summer outing. We deep fried a turkey, French fries, hushpuppies and had a fish boil. Worked great! Heats the water and oil very fast. Love the automatic gas shutoff to prevent over heating!
customer_reviews.author: JZ

product_meta.title: King Kooker 1265BF3 Portable Propane Outdoor Deep Frying/Boiling Package with 2 Aluminum Pots
product_meta.description: Fry up to a 20 pound turkey outdoors, or fry fresh filets to a crispy golden brown with this King Kooker Portable Propane Outdoor Cooker Package with Two Aluminum Pots. The 12" portable propane outdoor cooker has a high pressure 33,000 BTU cast burner and the package includes a large 29 quart aluminum turkey pot with lid, and punched aluminum basket for boiling. Also includes turkey rack and lifting hook, and an 11 quart aluminum fry pan with basket and heat resistant handle. Use the deep fry thermometer to monitor the temperature of the oil and adjust the flame with the adjustable regulator with battery operated timer. Fry the perfect turkey at your next feast, boil corn and potatoes or fry the fresh catch of the day. Try the suggestions in our detailed instruction/recipe booklet, or create your own favorites. King Kooker lets you eat like a King. CSA Design Certified Unit.
feature_bullets: 29 Qt. Aluminum Turkey Pot with Lid and Basket
11 Qt. Aluminum Fry Pan and Basket with Heat Resistant Handle
